Handler.HandlerInternalSupplementalInformationTe: The Carlyss Pit #1 Site was formerly a Chemical Disposal Facility. The materials set for disposal are soil, water, and expendable supplies derived from investigation and monitoring activities that are part of ongoing remedial research. Waste characterization sampling has been completed and some of the soil and water is classified as Hazardous.
